dt: {bc}to make (skin) tan especially by exposure to the sun
{bc}to convert (hide) into leather by treatment with an infusion of tannin-rich bark or other agent of similar effect
{bc}to convert (protein) to leather or a similar substance

et: Middle English {it}tannen{/it}, from Anglo-French {it}tanner{/it}, from Medieval Latin {it}tannare{/it}, from {it}tanum, tannum{/it} tanbark
shortdef: to make (skin) tan especially by exposure to the sun
to convert (hide) into leather by treatment with an infusion of tannin-rich bark or other agent of similar effect
to convert (protein) to leather or a similar substance

dt: {bc}of, relating to, or used for tan or tanning

shortdef: of, relating to, or used for tan or tanning

dt: {bc}a brown color imparted to the skin especially by exposure to the sun
{bc}a tanning material or its active agent (such as tannin)

et: French, tanbark, from Old French, from Medieval Latin {it}tanum{/it}
shortdef: a brown color imparted to the skin especially by exposure to the sun

dt: {bc}a line that distinguishes a {d_link|suntan|suntan} from a paler shade of skin and that shows where an area of skin was covered (as by clothing) when the tanning occurred

dt.t: While the new swimming costume would, in all possibility, leave your body with bizarre {wi}tan lines{/wi}, celebrities seem to be unperturbed by the after-effects.
My dad, Larry—Yogi's oldest son—recently found a {wi}tan line{/wi} beneath the '63 ring he got from his dad.

shortdef: a line that distinguishes a suntan from a paler shade of skin and that shows where an area of skin was covered (as by clothing) when the tanning occurred

dt: {bc}a U.S. Pacific coast evergreen tree ({it}Lithocarpus densiflora{/it}) of the beech family that has erect staminate catkins and furrowed brown bark rich in tannins

shortdef: a U.S. Pacific coast evergreen tree (Lithocarpus densiflora) of the beech family that has erect staminate catkins and furrowed brown bark rich in tannins

dt.t: He threatened to {it}tan my hide{/it} if I didn't do what he told me to do.

shortdef: to beat or whip (someone) very badly

dt: {bc}having a predominantly black color pattern with deep red or rusty tan usually on the feet, breeching, and cheek patches, above the eyes, and inside the ears
{bc}favoring or practicing proportional representation of Black and white people in politics {dx}compare {dxt|lily-white||3}{/dx}
{bc}frequented by both Black and white people

shortdef: having a predominantly black color pattern with deep red or rusty tan usually on the feet, breeching, and cheek patches, above the eyes, and inside the ears
favoring or practicing proportional representation of Black and white people in politics
frequented by both Black and white people

dt: {bc}a drink consisting of a dark beer (such as stout or porter) and ale or beer of a paler color

et: from the color of his uniform
dt: {bc}a recruit enlisted in England in 1920–21 for service in the Royal Irish Constabulary against the armed movement for Irish independence

shortdef: a drink consisting of a dark beer (such as stout or porter) and ale or beer of a paler color
a recruit enlisted in England in 1920—21 for service in the Royal Irish Constabulary against the armed movement for Irish independence

dt: {bc}any of a breed of strong vigorous coonhounds of U.S. origin with black-and-tan markings

shortdef: any of a breed of strong vigorous coonhounds of U.S. origin with black-and-tan markings
